ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen pound cake, thawed and cut into cubes
1 (12 ounce) jar hot fudge ice cream topping, warmed

cookingTips: Layer ingredients in order: cake, filling, fudge, whipped topping for visual appeal
Assemble trifle 2-4 hours before serving so flavors meld
Drizzle warm fudge over cake layers so it soaks in slightly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can layering in a clear bowl turn simple components into an impressive dessert?
